did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Edwin R. Hoskins papers, [ca.1911-1962].
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Papers concerning administration and supervision of agricultural education; agricultural education curricula; education of teachers; farming programs; agricultural education in secondary schools; institutional on-farm training; and other aspects of agricultural education. Includes reports, surveys, and studies; bulletins; pamphlets; photographs; lectures; corespondence; and other papers.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Edwin Raymond Hoskins (Cornell University Class of 1919, M.S. 1924, Ph.D. 1933) was Professor of Rural Education, Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Papers concerning administration and supervision of agricultural education; agricultural education curricula; education of teachers; farming programs; agricultural education in secondary schools; institutional on-farm training; and other aspects of agricultural education. Includes reports, surveys, and studies; bulletins; pamphlets; photographs; lectures; corespondence; and other papers.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Edwin Raymond Hoskins Papers, #21-32-1007. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
